concise_definition: n. 人名：德里克（英文名Derek的音译）

definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Germanic origin, derived from the Old High German name 'Theodoric', meaning 'ruler of the people'. Commonly used in English-speaking countries as a personal name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自古高地德语名字 'Theodoric' 的男性名，意为‘人民的统治者’，在英语国家中常作为人名使用。
definitions.example_en: Derek Jeter is a famous former professional baseball player.
definitions.example_cn: 德里克·杰特是一位著名的前职业棒球运动员。
